text: Hagi agu'vazi kuma'ma afetema me'nena, ana vahe'ma hantga huno ahefrisia ne'mo'a, karanka zahufa nevinke'za hazenkea osu'nesianagi frisia ne'mofo naga'amo'za ome azeri'za ahegahaze. Ana nera hazenke'a omne'ne. Na'ankure ahenakure huno ahefria nera ohe'neanki, ru eri'za erirega ruhantga huno ahefri'ne.
